short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find manuals for any device or software online!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly and easily search for the manual you need and narrow down your search using our "Search to Manuals" extension. 

This extension updates browser search provider and enable users to get results for Manuals.

How to Search for Manuals:
- Start typing Manuals and press "Tab" when you see the magnifying glass icon,
  Then start typing your search

Easily get access to thousands of manuals search results with this extension.

This extension updates your browser default search settings in the following ways:
- Allows for custom manuals searches directly from your browser omnibox
- Sets Yahoo as the default search setting in your browser"
